resources.string: From Android 6.0 Marshmallow onwards the application requires Location permission in order to scan for Bluetooth devices. \n\nThis is because Bluetooth beacons, for example iBeacons or Eddystone, may be used to determine the phone\'s and user\'s location. The IoTSSC app will not use this information in any way.
